about_the_game:
The Wasteland 3 Colorado Survival Gear provides upgraded weapons and unique accessories to give you a head start in the wasteland.



  • Ranger General's Hat provides +1 to all Attributes and a sense of style General Vargas would be proud of.
  • Polished Ranger's Badge provides +5% XP to help you get your footing.
  • Snow camo weapons give you a slight edge over the gangs, cults, and creatures of the wasteland.

Colorado Survival Gear is automatically placed in your inventory at the start of any new game. The snow camo weapons you're given depends on the weapon proficiency chosen during character creation.
